modules.title: Projects
modules.subtitle: The following case studies are a showcase of work that I have completed. It is a constant work in progress and will be updated as more projects are finished. The variety of projects that I have worked on include aspects I've learned about HTML, CSS, responsive layouts, PHP, Javascript and SVG.

modules.title: TareUhhhhhh Gaming
modules.teaser: Theming Project designed to put together a cohesive site after doing market research into a chosen industry.

modules.title: Exercises For Programmers
modules.teaser: A collection of exercises from the book of the same name by Brian Hogan.

modules.title: Responsive Layout Garden
modules.teaser: In an effort to truly master building responsive sites and modules, I have cultivated a garden of various layouts that will look their best on screens of all sizes.

modules.title: Personal Website
modules.teaser: This site that you are looking at currently was built by hand. By me. No template necessary.
